email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope you're doing well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Trader, available for this route. The vessel has a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280 meters. The laycan is October 15-20. Our starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider lowering it to the low 50s, say $50.75? Also, can you confirm the laytime and demurrage terms? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can offer a revised rate of $51.00 per metric ton, which I believe is competitive given the current market. Laytime is 72 hours, and demurrage is set at $25,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.00 sounds reasonable. However, could we push the laycan to October 16-21 to better align with our schedule? Also, can we cap the demurrage at $20,000 per day? Let me know your thoughts. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I can adjust the laycan to October 16-21 as requested. However, the demurrage rate of $25,000 is non-negotiable due to the vessel’s operational costs. If this works for you, I can prepare the charter party agreement. Let me know. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, understood on the demurrage. Let’s proceed with the laycan of October 16-21 and the freight rate of $51.00. Please send over the charter party agreement for review. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great! I’ll have the charter party agreement sent over by end of day. Thanks for your cooperation, and let me know if you need anything else. Best, Sarah
